headline: An Animal-Free Diet, for a Month at Least
abstract: Veganuary, a campaign that started in the United Kingdom, has made its way to these shores.
lead_paragraph: It would be his last slice of cheesy pizza, so he ate three on New Yearâ€™s Eve. The next morning, Danny Swift, 25, a data scientist who lives in Manhattan, woke up hung over but determined to go vegan.
